name: Adder
desc: An abstract class for all adder module.

name: Adder
desc:
Takes in input a and input b and return the sum of the addition
result. The width of input a and b must be the same.

name: a
desc: The input to the adder pin a.

name: b
desc: The input to the adder pin b.

name: sum
desc: The addition results sum.

name: ApbCompleterAgent
desc: A model for the completer side of an ApbInterface.

name: ApbCompleterAgent
desc: Creates a new model ApbCompleterAgent.

name: dropWriteDataOnError
desc:
If true, then writes that respond with an error will not store into the
storage.

name: intf
desc: The interface to drive.

name: invalidReadDataOnError
desc: If true, then returned data on an error will be x.

name: respondWithError
desc:
A function that determines whether a response for a request should contain
an error (slvErr).

name: responseDelay
desc: A function which delays the response for the given request.

name: run
desc: Executes this Component's activities related to running the test.

name: selectIndex
desc: The index that this is listening to on the intf.

name: storage
desc: A place where the completer should save and retrieve data.

name: ApbComplianceChecker
desc: A checker for some of the rules defined in the APB interface specification.

name: ApbComplianceChecker
desc: Creates a new compliance checker for intf.

name: intf
desc: The interface being checked.

name: run
desc: Executes this Component's activities related to running the test.

name: ApbDirection
desc: A grouping of signals on the ApbInterface interface based on direction.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: ApbInterface
desc: A standard APB interface.

name: ApbInterface
desc: Construct a new instance of an APB interface.

name: aUser
desc: User request attribute.

name: addr
desc: Address bus.

name: addrWidth
desc: The width of address port addr.

name: bUser
desc: User response attribute.

name: clk
desc: Clock for the interface.

name: ApbInterface.clone
desc: Constructs a new ApbInterface with identical parameters to other.

name: dataWidth
desc: The width of data ports wData and rData;

name: enable
desc: Enable.

name: includeSlvErr
desc: If true, generates the slvErr port.

name: includeWakeup
desc: If true, indicates that this interface supports wake-up.

name: nse
desc: Extension to protection type.

name: numSelects
desc: The number of select signals on this interface.

name: prot
desc: Protection type.

name: rData
desc: Read data.

name: rUser
desc: User read data attribute.

name: ready
desc: Ready.

name: resetN
desc: Reset signal (active LOW).

name: sel
desc: Select.

name: slvErr
desc: Transfer error.

name: strb
desc: Write strobe.

name: userDataWidth
desc: The width of user-defined data ports wUser and rUser.

name: userReqWidth
desc: The width of user request port aUser.

name: userRespWidth
desc: The width of user response port bUser.

name: wData
desc: Write data.

name: wUser
desc: User write data attribute.

name: wakeup
desc: Wake-up.

name: write
desc: Direction.

name: ApbMonitor
desc: A monitor for ApbInterfaces.

name: ApbMonitor
desc: Creates a new ApbMonitor on intf.

name: intf
desc: The interface to monitor.

name: run
desc: Executes this Component's activities related to running the test.

name: ApbPacket
desc: A packet on an ApbInterface.

name: ApbPacket
desc: Creates a new packet.

name: addr
desc: The address for this packet.

name: complete
desc: Called by a completer when a transfer is completed.

name: completed
desc: A Future that completes once the the read has been completed.

name: returnedSlvErr
desc: Error indication returned by the read.

name: selectIndex
desc: The index of the select this packet should be driven on.

name: trackerString
desc: Returns a formatted String value associated with field in this object.

name: ApbReadPacket
desc: A read packet on an ApbInterface.

name: ApbReadPacket
desc: Creates a read packet.

name: complete
desc: Called by a completer when a transfer is completed.

name: returnedData
desc: Data returned by the read.

name: trackerString
desc: Returns a formatted String value associated with field in this object.

name: ApbRequesterAgent
desc: An agent for sending requests on an ApbInterface.

name: ApbRequesterAgent
desc: Constructs a new ApbRequesterAgent.

name: driver
desc: The driver that sends the requests over the interface.

name: dropDelayCycles
desc:
The number of cycles before an objection will be dropped when there are
no pending packets to send.

name: intf
desc: The interface to drive.

name: sequencer
desc: The sequencer where requests should be sent.

name: timeoutCycles
desc: The number of cycles before timing out if no transactions can be sent.

name: ApbRequesterDriver
desc: A driver for the ApbInterface from the requester side.

name: ApbRequesterDriver
desc: Creates a new ApbRequesterDriver.

name: intf
desc: The interface to drive.

name: run
desc: Executes this Component's activities related to running the test.

name: ApbTracker
desc: A tracker for the ApbInterface.

name: ApbTracker
desc: Creates a new tracker for ApbInterface.

name: addrField
desc: Tracker field for address.

name: dataField
desc: Tracker field for data.

name: selectField
desc: Tracker field for select.

name: slverrField
desc: Tracker field for errors.

name: strobeField
desc: Tracker field for strobe.

name: timeField
desc: Tracker field for simulation time.

name: typeField
desc: Tracker field for type (R/W).

name: ApbWritePacket
desc: A write packet on an ApbInterface.

name: ApbWritePacket
desc: Creates a write packet.

name: data
desc: The data for this packet.

name: strobe
desc: The strobe associated with this write.

name: trackerString
desc: Returns a formatted String value associated with field in this object.

name: Arbiter
desc: An abstract description of an arbiter module.

name: Arbiter
desc:
Constructs an arbiter where each element in requests is a one-bit signal
requesting a corresponding bit from grants.

name: count
desc: The total number of requests and grants for this Arbiter.

name: grants
desc:
Each element corresponds to an arbitration grant of the correspondingly
indexed request passed at construction time.

name: requests
desc: Each element is the input pin for the correspondingly indexed request.

name: BinaryToOneHot
desc: Encodes a binary number into one-hot

name: BinaryToOneHot
desc:
Constructs a Module which encodes a 2's complement number binary
into a one-hot, or thermometer code

name: encoded
desc: The encoded one-hot result.

name: BitonicSort
desc:
Bitonic Sort is a pipelined sort module that sort toSort to
specified order based on isAscending.

name: BitonicSort
desc: Constructs a Module to sort list of Logic.

name: latency
desc: The latency of the bitonic sort algorithm.

name: sorted
desc: The sorted result.

name: BitonicSortConfigurator
desc: A Configurator for BitonicSort.

name: createModule
desc: Creates a Module instance as configured.

name: isAscendingKnob
desc: A knob controlling whether to sort in ascending (or descending) order.

name: knobs
desc:
A mapping from configuration names to ConfigKnobs that can be used
to configure this component.

name: lengthOfListKnob
desc: A knob controlling the number of items to sort.

name: logicWidthKnob
desc: A knob controlling the width of each element to sort.

name: name
desc: The name of this Configurator.

name: CarrySaveMultiplier
desc: A binary multiplier using carry-save technique with pipelining.

name: CarrySaveMultiplier
desc: Construct a CarrySaveMultiplier that multiply input a and input b.

name: latency
desc: The latency of the carry save multiplier.

name: product
desc: The final product of the multiplier module.

name: CarrySaveMultiplierConfigurator
desc: A Configurator for CarrySaveMultiplier.

name: createModule
desc: Creates a Module instance as configured.

name: knobs
desc:
A mapping from configuration names to ConfigKnobs that can be used
to configure this component.

name: logicWidthKnob
desc: A knob controlling the width of the inputs to a CarrySaveMultiplier.

name: name
desc: The name of this Configurator.

name: ChoiceConfigKnob
desc: A ConfigKnob for selecting one of multiple options.

name: ChoiceConfigKnob
desc:
Creates a new knob to with the specified default value of the available
choices.

name: choices
desc: The available choices to choose from.

name: loadJson
desc: Reconfigures this knob based on the provided deserialized JSON.

name: toJson
desc: Serializes this knob into a JSON-compatible map.

name: value
desc: The primary value being stored in this knob.

name: ConfigKnob
desc: A configuration knob for use in Configurators.

name: ConfigKnob
desc: Creates a new knob with an initial value.

name: loadJson
desc: Reconfigures this knob based on the provided deserialized JSON.

name: toJson
desc: Serializes this knob into a JSON-compatible map.

name: value
desc: The primary value being stored in this knob.

name: Configurator
desc:
An object that enables a consisten API for configuring a Module and
performing common tasks with it.

name: createModule
desc: Creates a Module instance as configured.

name: exampleTestVectors
desc:
A collection of test vectors, one per cycle, that can be used to generate
a simple test and waveform as an example for this component.

name: generateSV
desc: Generates SystemVerilog for the module as configured.

name: knobs
desc:
A mapping from configuration names to ConfigKnobs that can be used
to configure this component.

name: loadJson
desc: Loads the configuration from a serialized JSON representation.

name: name
desc: The name of this Configurator.

name: runExampleTest
desc: Runs the exampleTestVectors in simulation.

name: sanitaryName
desc:
A version of the name which has been sanitized to meet SystemVerilog
variable naming requirements.

name: toJson
desc: Serializes the configuration information into a JSON structure.

name: Count
desc: Count 1 or 0

name: Count
desc: Count 1 or 0

name: index
desc: index is an getter for output of Count

name: DataPortGroup
desc: A grouping for interface signals of DataPortInterfaces.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: DataPortInterface
desc: An interface to a simple memory that only needs enable, address, and data.

name: DataPortInterface
desc:
Constructs a new interface of specified dataWidth and addrWidth for
interacting with a memory in either the read or write direction.

name: addr
desc: The "address" bit for a request when en is high.

name: addrWidth
desc: The width of addresses in the memory.

name: clone
desc: Makes a copy of this Interface with matching configuration.

name: data
desc: The data sent or received with the associated request.

name: dataWidth
desc: The width of data in the memory.

name: en
desc: The "enable" bit for this interface, enabling a request.

name: Fifo
desc: A simple FIFO (First In, First Out).

name: Fifo
desc: Constructs a FIFO with RF-based storage.

name: dataWidth
desc: The width of the data transmitted through this FIFO.

name: depth
desc: The depth of this FIFO.

name: empty
desc: High if there is nothing in the FIFO.

name: error
desc: High if an error condition is reached.

name: full
desc: High if the entire FIFO is full and it cannot accept any more new items.

name: generateBypass
desc:
If true, then it is possible to bypass through the FIFO by writing
and reading at the same time while empty.

name: generateError
desc: If true, then the error output will be generated.

name: generateOccupancy
desc: If true, then the occupancy output will be generated.

name: occupancy
desc: The number of items in the FIFO.

name: readData
desc: Read data for the next item in the FIFO.

name: FifoChecker
desc:
A checker for Fifos that they are being used properly and not reaching any
dangerous conditions.

name: FifoChecker
desc: Builds a checker for a fifo.

name: check
desc: Performs additional checks at the end of the simulation.

name: enableEndOfTestEmptyCheck
desc: If true, will check that fifo is empty at the end of the test.

name: enableOverflowCheck
desc: If true, will flag an error if there is an overflow in the fifo.

name: enableUnderflowCheck
desc: If true, will flag an error if there is an underflow in the fifo.

name: fifo
desc: The Fifo being checked.

name: FifoConfigurator
desc: A Configurator for Fifo.

name: createModule
desc: Creates a Module instance as configured.

name: dataWidthKnob
desc: A knob controlling the data width of the FIFO.

name: depthKnob
desc: A knob controlling the depth of the FIFO.

name: generateBypassKnob
desc: A knob controlling the generation of bypass functionality.

name: generateErrorKnob
desc: A knob controlling the generation of an error signal.

name: generateOccupancyKnob
desc: A knob controlling the generation of an occupancy signal.

name: knobs
desc:
A mapping from configuration names to ConfigKnobs that can be used
to configure this component.

name: name
desc: The name of this Configurator.

name: FifoTracker
desc: A tracker for a Fifo which can generate logs.

name: FifoTracker
desc: Constructs a new tracker for fifo.

name: Find
desc: Find functionality

name: Find
desc: Find 1s or 0s

name: error
desc:
error is an getter for error in Find
When your find is not found it will result in error 1

name: generateError
desc: If true, then the error output will be generated.

name: index
desc: index is an getter for output of Find

name: FullAdder
desc: A simple full-adder with inputs a and b to be added with a carryIn.

name: FullAdder
desc:
Constructs a FullAdder with value a, b and carryIn based on
full adder truth table.

name: carryOut
desc: The carry bit's result carryOut.

name: sum
desc: The addition's result sum.

name: GroupOfKnobs
desc: A knob which groups together other ConfigKnobs.

name: GroupOfKnobs
desc: Creates a new group of subKnobs under one knob.

name: loadJson
desc: Reconfigures this knob based on the provided deserialized JSON.

name: name
desc: The name of this group.

name: subKnobs
desc: A mapping from a sub-knob name to a corresponding sub-ConfigKnob.

name: toJson
desc: Serializes this knob into a JSON-compatible map.

name: IntConfigKnob
desc: A knob to store an int.

name: IntConfigKnob
desc: Creates a new config knob with the specified initial value.

name: loadJson
desc: Reconfigures this knob based on the provided deserialized JSON.

name: toJson
desc: Serializes this knob into a JSON-compatible map.

name: ListOfKnobsKnob
desc: A knob wich holds a collection of other ConfigKnobs.

name: ListOfKnobsKnob
desc:
Creates a new collection of count knobs, each initially generated by
generateKnob, and named name.

name: count
desc: The number of elements in the collection.

name: generateKnob
desc:
A function that should generate the initial ConfigKnob for the
indexth element in the collection.

name: knobs
desc: The List of ConfigKnobs collected by this knob.

name: loadJson
desc: Reconfigures this knob based on the provided deserialized JSON.

name: name
desc: The name of this collection of knobs.

name: toJson
desc: Serializes this knob into a JSON-compatible map.

name: MaskRoundRobinArbiter
desc: A RoundRobinArbiter implemented using request and grant masks.

name: MaskRoundRobinArbiter
desc:
Round Robin arbiter handles requests by granting each requestor
and keeping record of requests already granted, in order to mask it until
granting the turn of each request to start again

name: MaskedDataPortInterface
desc: A DataPortInterface that supports byte-enabled strobing.

name: MaskedDataPortInterface
desc: Constructs a DataPortInterface with mask.

name: clone
desc: Makes a copy of this Interface with matching configuration.

name: mask
desc:
A bus controlling the mask, where each bit cooresponds to one
byte of data.  A high bit is an enable for that chunk of data.

name: Memory
desc: A generic memory with variable numbers of read and write ports.

name: Memory
desc: Construct a new memory.

name: addrWidth
desc: The address width.

name: clk
desc: Internal clock.

name: dataWidth
desc: The data width.

name: numReads
desc: The number of read ports.

name: numWrites
desc: The number of write ports.

name: rdPorts
desc: Internal read ports.

name: readLatency
desc: The number of cycles before data is returned after a read.

name: reset
desc: Internal reset.

name: wrPorts
desc: Internal write ports.

name: MemoryModel
desc:
A model of a Memory which uses a software-based SparseMemoryStorage to
store data.

name: MemoryModel
desc: Creates a new MemoryModel.

name: asyncReset
desc: If true, a positive edge on reset will reset the memory asynchronously.

name: readLatency
desc: The number of cycles before data is returned after a read.

name: storage
desc: The memory storage underlying this model.

name: MemoryStorage
desc: A storage for memory models.

name: MemoryStorage
desc: Constrcuts a MemoryStorage with specified addrWidth and dataWidth.

name: addrWidth
desc: The width of addresses.

name: alignAddress
desc: A function to align addresses when used for transactions.

name: dataWidth
desc: The width of data.

name: getData
desc: Returns the data at addr, or null if it is not present.

name: invalidWrite
desc:
Triggers behavior associated with an invalid write, including calling
onInvalidWrite and resetting all of memory.

name: isEmpty
desc: Returns true if there is no data stored in this memory.

name: loadMemHex
desc: Reads a verilog-compliant hex file and preloads memory with it.

name: onInvalidRead
desc: A function called if a read is made to an address that has no data.

name: onInvalidWrite
desc: A function called if an invalid write is made when not isEmpty.

name: readData
desc:
Aligns the address with alignAddress, then returns either the getData
result in storage or else onInvalidRead's result.

name: reset
desc: Resets all memory to initial state.

name: setData
desc: Loads data into addr directly into storage.

name: writeData
desc:
Performs some validation on a write, aligns the address with
alignAddress, and then calls setData.

name: Multiplier
desc: An abstract class for all multiplier implementation.

name: Multiplier
desc:
Take input a and input b and return the
product of the multiplication result.

name: a
desc: The input to the multiplier pin a.

name: b
desc: The input to the multiplier pin b.

name: product
desc: The multiplication results of the multiplier.

name: OneHotConfigurator
desc: A Configurator for BinaryToOneHot and OneHotToBinary.

name: createModule
desc: Creates a Module instance as configured.

name: directionKnob
desc:
Controls whether toggling from binary to one-hot or
from one-hot to binary.

name: generateErrorKnob
desc: When available, controls whether to generate an error signal.

name: inputWidthKnob
desc: Controls the width of the input.

name: knobs
desc:
A mapping from configuration names to ConfigKnobs that can be used
to configure this component.

name: name
desc: The name of this Configurator.

name: OneHotToBinary
desc: Decodes a one-hot number into binary using a for-loop

name: OneHotToBinary
desc:
Constructs a Module which decodes a one-hot or thermometer-encoded
number onehot into a 2s complement number binary by encoding
the position of the '1'

name: binary
desc: The binary decoded result.

name: error
desc: The error in getting result.

name: generateError
desc: If true, then the error output will be generated.

name: ParityReceiver
desc: Check for error & Receive data on transmitted data via parity

name: ParityReceiver
desc:
Constructs a Module which encodes data transmitted via parity.
This will split the transmitted data in bus into 2 parts: the data
having the original, and the error bit upon which checkError is
calculated for parity error checking.

name: checkError
desc:
checkError is an getter for parity result with
0 for success and 1 for fail

name: data
desc: data is an getter for transmitted/original data (without parityBit)

name: parityBit
desc: parityBit is an getter for parity Bit received upon data transmission

name: ParityTransmitter
desc: Encode data to transport with Parity bits

name: ParityTransmitter
desc:
Construct a Module for generating transmit data data.
Combine given Logic named bus with a parity bit for error check after
transmission

name: data
desc: data is an getter for transmit data having a parity check

name: parity
desc: parity is a getter for parity bit

name: PriorityArbiter
desc: An Arbiter which always picks the lowest-indexed request.

name: PriorityArbiter
desc:
Constructs an arbiter where the grant is given to the lowest-indexed
request.

name: PriorityArbiterConfigurator
desc: A Configurator for PriorityArbiter.

name: createModule
desc: Creates a Module instance as configured.

name: knobs
desc:
A mapping from configuration names to ConfigKnobs that can be used
to configure this component.

name: name
desc: The name of this Configurator.

name: numRequestKnob
desc: A knob controlling the number of requests and grants.

name: RegisterFile
desc: A flop-based memory.

name: RegisterFile
desc: Constructs a new RF.

name: getData
desc: A testbench hook to access data at a given address.

name: numEntries
desc: The number of entries in the RF.

name: rdData
desc: Accesses the read data for the provided index.

name: readLatency
desc: The number of cycles before data is returned after a read.

name: RegisterFileConfigurator
desc: A Configurator for RegisterFiles.

name: addrWidthKnob
desc: Controls the width of the address.

name: createModule
desc: Creates a Module instance as configured.

name: dataWidthKnob
desc: Controls the width of the data.

name: knobs
desc:
A mapping from configuration names to ConfigKnobs that can be used
to configure this component.

name: maskedWritesKnob
desc: Controls whether write data is masked.

name: name
desc: The name of this Configurator.

name: numEntriesKnob
desc: Controls the number of entries in the RF.

name: numReadPortsKnobs
desc: Controls the number of read ports.

name: numWritePortsKnobs
desc: Controls the number of write ports.

name: RippleCarryAdder
desc:
An RippleCarryAdder is a digital circuit used for binary addition. It
consists of a series of full adders connected in a chain, with the carry
output of each adder linked to the carry input of the next one. Starting
from the least significant bit (LSB) to most significant bit (MSB), the
adder sequentially adds corresponding bits of two binary numbers.

name: RippleCarryAdder
desc: Constructs an n-bit adder based on inputs List of inputs.

name: RippleCarryAdderConfigurator
desc: A Configurator for RippleCarryAdder.

name: createModule
desc: Creates a Module instance as configured.

name: knobs
desc:
A mapping from configuration names to ConfigKnobs that can be used
to configure this component.

name: logicWidthKnob
desc: A knob controlling the width of the inputs to the adder.

name: name
desc: The name of this Configurator.

name: RohdHclException
desc: An Exception for the ROHD Hardware Component Library.

name: RohdHclException
desc: Creates an Exception for the ROHD Hardware Component Library.

name: message
desc: A message explaining this Exception.

name: RotateConfigurator
desc: A Configurator for rotation.

name: createModule
desc: Creates a Module instance as configured.

name: directionKnob
desc: A knob controlling the direction of rotation.

name: exampleTestVectors
desc:
A collection of test vectors, one per cycle, that can be used to generate
a simple test and waveform as an example for this component.

name: knobs
desc:
A mapping from configuration names to ConfigKnobs that can be used
to configure this component.

name: maxAmountKnob
desc: A knob controlling the maximum amount to rotate by to support.

name: name
desc: The name of this Configurator.

name: originalWidthKnob
desc: A knob controlling the width of the input to be rotated.

name: rotateWidthKnob
desc: A knob controlling the width of the control for rotation amount.

name: RotateDirection
desc: A direction for something to rotate.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: RotateLeft
desc: Rotates a Logic to the left.

name: RotateLeft
desc: Constructs a Module to perform rotation to the left.

name: maxAmount
desc: The maximum amount that this _Rotate should support in rotation.

name: rotated
desc: The rotated result.

name: RotateLeftFixed
desc: Rotates left by a fixed amount.

name: RotateLeftFixed
desc: Rotates original by rotateAmount to the left.

name: rotated
desc: The rotated result.

name: RotateLogic
desc: Adds rotation functions to Logic.

name: rotateLeft
desc: Returns a Logic rotated left by rotateAmount.

name: rotateRight
desc: Returns a Logic rotated right by rotateAmount.

name: RotateLogicValue
desc: Adds rotation functions to LogicValue.

name: rotateLeft
desc: Rotates this value by rotateAmount to the left.

name: rotateRight
desc: Rotates this value by rotateAmount to the right.

name: RotateRight
desc: Rotates a Logic to the right.

name: RotateRight
desc: Constructs a Module to perform rotation to the right.

name: maxAmount
desc: The maximum amount that this _Rotate should support in rotation.

name: rotated
desc: The rotated result.

name: RotateRightFixed
desc: Rotates right by a fixed amount.

name: RotateRightFixed
desc: Rotates original by rotateAmount to the right.

name: rotated
desc: The rotated result.

name: RotateRoundRobinArbiter
desc: A RoundRobinArbiter implemented using rotations and a PriorityArbiter.

name: RotateRoundRobinArbiter
desc: Creates an Arbiter that fairly takes turns between requests.

name: RoundRobinArbiter
desc: A StatefulArbiter which fairly arbitrates between requests.

name: RoundRobinArbiter
desc: By default, creates an instance of a MaskRoundRobinArbiter.

name: RoundRobinArbiterConfigurator
desc: A Configurator for PriorityArbiter.

name: createModule
desc: Creates a Module instance as configured.

name: implementationKnob
desc: A knob controlling the implementation.

desc:
A mapping from configuration names to ConfigKnobs that can be used
to configure this component.

name: name
desc: The name of this Configurator.

name: numRequestKnob
desc: A knob controlling the number of requests and grants.

name: ShiftRegister
desc:
A shift register with configurable width and depth and optional enable and
reset.

name: ShiftRegister
desc:
Creates a new shift register with specified depth which is only active
when enabled. If reset is provided, it will reset to a default of 0
at all stages synchronously with clk or to the provided resetValue.

name: dataName
desc: The name of the data, used for naming the ports and Module.

name: dataOut
desc: The main output of the shift register after going through all the stages.

name: depth
desc: The number of stages in this shift register.

name: stages
desc:
A List of outputs where the n'th entry corresponds to a version of
the input data after passing through n + 1 flops.

name: width
desc: The width of the data passing through this shfit register.

name: Sort
desc: An abstract class for all sort algorithm.

name: Sort
desc:
Sort algorithm MUST have List of toSort, direction of
sort isAscending and a name for the sorting module.

name: isAscending
desc: Whether the sort isAscending order.

name: toSort
desc: The List of logic to Sort

name: SparseMemoryStorage
desc: A sparse storage for memory models.

name: SparseMemoryStorage
desc:
Constructs a new sparse memory storage with specified addrWidth for all
addresses.

name: getData
desc: Returns the data at addr, or null if it is not present.

name: isEmpty
desc: Returns true if there is no data stored in this memory.

name: reset
desc: Resets all memory to initial state.

name: setData
desc: Loads data into addr directly into storage.

name: StatefulArbiter
desc: An Arbiter which holds state in order to arbitrate.

name: StatefulArbiter
desc: Creates a new StatefulArbiter with associated clk and reset.

name: clk
desc: The clock used for sequential elements.

name: reset
desc: The reset used for sequential elements (active high).

name: StringConfigKnob
desc: A knob for holding a String.

name: StringConfigKnob
desc: Creates a new knob with the specified initial value.

name: ToggleConfigKnob
desc: A knob for holding a bool.

name: ToggleConfigKnob
desc: Creates a new knob with the specified initial value.

name: TreeOneHotToBinary
desc: Module for binary-tree recursion for decoding one-hot

name: TreeOneHotToBinary
desc: Top level module for computing binary to one-hot using recursion

name: binary
desc: The binary decoded result.

name: log2Ceil
desc: Compute the bit width needed to store w addresses
